Regulation Name(s): Quantitative Cytomegalovirus Nucleic Acid Tests For Transplant Patient Management
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Aptima CMV Quant Assay using real-time TMA on the Panther system for quantitation of CMV DNA in plasma from transplant patients with an updated protocol for proteinase K treatment.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitation of human cytomegalovirus (CMV) DNA in EDTA plasma on the fully automated Panther system to aid in management of solid-organ and hematopoietic stem cell transplant patients; not intended for CMV screening in blood or blood products.
